about_the_game:
(Silent Mansion VR does not support WMR)

☆★ Review Event! ★☆

Hello. Thank you for playing our game.

We fixed and updated some glitches in the Silent Mansion VR series and are working on the next game project.
We expect it to be released in July.

It is an adventure game of fantasy genre like a fairy tale, and it has excellent graphics that everyone will like.
We are very focused on implementing features to make it a great game.

To make this game perfect, we're going to refer to the elements that were praised in the previous game.

But there was a lack of reference to what elements were fun and novel in the previous game.

If you leave comments on what was good about SummonerVR, it will help us create the next game.

If you could give your comments to CUSTOMER REVIEWS on the Corrupted Hospital and Silent Mention Store page,
We're going to draw some good reviews and send you the game key for the next game.

If you write a good review on both games, we will send you the key of the next game.

PS. Those who have already written will be included in the draw!

Thank you!

--------------------------------------- Game Introduction ---------------------------------------

Silent Mansion is a mystery place with a beautiful atmosphere.

You will find clues in this historic mansion and chase a witch.

In this place where fear and beauty coexist, you can solve puzzles and experience action.

The experience of high quality graphics will give you the illusion that you are there!

And there is an event stage that is able to enter after you clear all stages.

At the event stage, you have to fight against a more powerful witch!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains explicit violence and gore.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Standing or Room Scale
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 8700k / AMD Ryzen 7 1800X or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon Vega 56 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
